archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.1.9a: a) development of business applications (e.g. to help manage complexity and scale, make effective design decisions, and improve the quality and security of business applications)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
